text: The Order of the Blackened Sky is a chivalric order in [[Karrnath]] that focuses on the development and use of [[alchemical|alchemist]] weapons, [[siege staff]]s, and other tools of [[artifice|artificer]]. In recent years, these champions of industry have also become one of Karrnathâ€™s greatest defenders against monstrous incursions from the [[Mournland]]. Its headquarters is located in [[Karrlakton]].
title: Blackened Sky
